name: AiPOCALYPSE
description:
Story

The robots are about to conquer the world and is up to you to GunKeeper#417 to provide them with required firepower.

How To Play

  1. Unpack mod boxes by placing them on the shelf. Each mod box contains 4 random mods of one type.
  2. Start with the body rifle on the workbench and add the required mods from the requests.
  3. You can cycle though the requests from the monitor or the laptop
  4. If you don't have the required mod you can buy a new random mod box from the phone. The new box will spawn near the window
  5. Once you finish a weapon place it in the self near the door .Green light means is ok red means smth is wrong with it.
  6. There are 3 requests 
  7. Have Fun

(Note: you can not undo an attachment (yet))

To be added: npcs that come and go, improvements to rooms and outside area, more gun types and general improvements
